department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Request for office seating with the option of delivery by the deadline.
description: Public Works Government Services Canada’s (PWGSC) Real Property Branch, on behalf of its client Environment and Climate Change Canada, has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to the National Capital Region by March 31, 2024. The full Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded when logged into your SAP Ariba account.
full_summary:
### Office Seating Request for Proposal (RFP) ID: WS4382932555
### English
#### Official Title
EP916-241327 – Office Seating RFP
#### Reference and Solicitation Number
WS4382932555-Doc4382932776, WS4382932555
#### Status
Expired (Closed on January 10, 2024, at 14:00:00 EST)
#### Notice Date and Period
* Published: 2024-01-05
* Tender Closing Date: January 10, 2024 at 14:00:00 EST

### French
#### Official Title
EP916-241327 – DDS Fauteuils de bureau
#### Reference and Solicitation Number
WS4382932555-Doc4382932776, WS4382932555
#### Status
Expired (Cloturé le 10 janvier 2024, à 14:00:00 HNE)
#### Notice Date and Period
* Publication: 2024-01-05
* Appel d'offres de clôture du bâtiment: 10 janvier 2024 à 14h00 HNE

### Essential Details
#### Contract Requirements
Public Works Government Services Canada’s (PWGSC) Real Property Branch is seeking the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating for Environment and Climate Change Canada in the National Capital Region by March 31, 2024.

#### Specific Deliverables
The successful bidder will provide:

* Office chairs
* Task seating
#### Locations of Delivery
* National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria
The RFP will be evaluated based on the lowest price.
#### Amendment
Respondents must submit all required supporting documentation and the bid submission by 14:00:00 EST on January 10, 2024, to avoid being declared non-responsive.

#### Contact Information
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada. 
* Email: [michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). #office #seating#pwgsc-RFP(RequirementID:9) #contractorinfo. Not certified on CanLII Header Standards ARE PORTABLE ALSO HAS HOST MASTER USERS DRIVER QUEST
